articles.description: Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp ‘100%’ wants a Reds star - who has made 286 appearances since joining the club - to remain at Anfield beyond the end of the season.
articles.content:
Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp ‘100%’ wants to keep James Milner at Anfield as he is a ‘huge admirer’ of the midfielder, according to journalist Pete O’Rourke.

articles.title: Newcastle United 'end pursuit' of Manchester United outcast Jesse Lingard due to wage demands - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Magpies were desperate to sign the 29-year-old on loan during the January transfer window, but refused to pay the £16million loan fee demanded by Manchester United.
articles.content:
Newcastle United have reportedly ended their pursuit of England international Jesse Lingard due to his financial demands being too high to fit into the club's wage structure.
